com.viaoa.web

Class OAHtmlAttribute

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.viaoa.web.OAHtmlAttribute

  • public class OAHtmlAttribute
extends Object
    Used to set the Attribute value of an Html Element.
    See Also:
    OAHtmlElement.addAttribute(OAHtmlAttribute)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      OAHtmlAttribute(String attrName, com.viaoa.hub.Hub<?> hub, String propertyPath)
      Create an Html attribute controller, that will set the attr value to the value of the Hub.activeObject.
      OAHtmlAttribute(String attrName, String value)
      Create an Html attribute controller, that will set the value of the attribute to "value"

      This is called to get the value to set for the Html attribute.

      void setValue(String value)

    • Constructor Detail

      • OAHtmlAttribute

        public OAHtmlAttribute(String attrName,
                       com.viaoa.hub.Hub<?> hub,
                       String propertyPath)
        Create an Html attribute controller, that will set the attr value to the value of the Hub.activeObject. If the value is empty, then the attribute will be removed.
        Parameters:
        attrName - name of html attr that is to be changed.
        hub - the hub to use to get the value of activeObject.
        propertyPath - used to get the value of the hub.getAO (active object)

      • OAHtmlAttribute

        public OAHtmlAttribute(String attrName,
                       String value)
        Create an Html attribute controller, that will set the value of the attribute to "value"
        Parameters:
        attrName -
        value -
